settings.name: project
settings.description: The ID of the default project to send requests to.

settings.name: region
settings.description: The default region to send requests to.

params.name: creds
params.description: Vaulted JSON document containing service account credentials as provided by GCP

params.name: project
params.description: GCP Project defines how your app interacts with services and resources

params.name: healthCheckName
params.description: Name of the resource. Provided by the client when the resource is created. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: type
params.description: Specifies the type of the healthCheck, either TCP, SSL, HTTP, HTTPS or HTTP2. Exactly one of the protocol-specific health check field must be specified, which must match type field.

params.name: backendServiceName
params.description: Name of the resource. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: zone
params.description: Zone is a subdivision of GCP regions, typically region-a, b, or c

params.name: instanceGroupName
params.description: URL of the instance group, e.g., https://www.googleapis.com/compute/v1/projects/project/zones/region/instanceGroups/instance-group

params.name: urlMapName
params.description: Name of the resource. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: httpProxyName
params.description: Name of the resource. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: forwardingRuleName
params.description: Name of the resource. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: forwardRulePortRange
params.description: Packets addressed to ports in the specified range will be forwarded to http proxy

params.name: instanceGroupName

params.name: httpsProxyName

params.name: sslCertificateName
params.description: Name of the SSL certificate

params.name: forwardingRuleName
params.description: Name of the resource. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035.

params.name: forwardRulePortRange
params.description: Packets addressed to ports in the specified range will be forwarded to http proxy

params.name: creds
params.description: Vaulted JSON document containing service account credentials as provided by GCP

params.name: project
params.description: GCP Project defines how your app interacts with services and resources

params.name: healthCheckJSON
params.description: A JSON document describing the health check to create. Can be declared in Code e.g. const myHealthCheck = {"name": "healthCheck", ...} or a path to a JSON document on the Kaholo agent.

params.name: waitForOperation
params.description: Wait until the operation is completed before moving onto the next Action in the pipeline.
